skill.name: firebase-development-debug
skill.description: This skill should be used when troubleshooting Firebase emulator issues, rules violations, function errors, auth problems, or deployment failures. Triggers on "error", "not working", "debug", "troubleshoot", "failing", "broken", "permission denied", "emulator issue".

skill.author: 2389-research

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only markdown guidance. Static scanner findings are all false positives - JSON metadata fields were misidentified as security threats, bash code blocks in documentation were flagged as execution risks, and localhost emulator URLs were detected as network issues. No executable code exists in this skill.

content.value_statement: Firebase development issues can be difficult to troubleshoot without a systematic approach. This skill provides a step-by-step workflow for diagnosing emulator problems, rules violations, function errors, auth issues, and deployment failures.
actual_capabilities: Diagnose emulator port conflicts and startup issues
Identify and fix Firestore rules violations
Use Emulator UI and Rules Playground for diagnosis
limitations: Does not modify project files automatically
Does not execute code on user behalf

use_cases.title: Emulator startup issues
use_cases.description: Resolve port conflicts and initialization errors when Firebase emulators fail to start

use_cases.title: Rules violations
use_cases.description: Diagnose PERMISSION_DENIED errors and fix Firestore security rules

use_cases.title: Function deployment failures
use_cases.description: Debug Cloud Functions errors and deployment configuration issues

prompt_templates.title: Emulator wont start
prompt_templates.prompt: Firebase emulators are not starting. I see port conflict errors. Help me debug this issue.

prompt_templates.title: Rules permission denied
prompt_templates.prompt: Getting PERMISSION_DENIED errors when trying to write to Firestore in the emulator. Debug my security rules.

prompt_templates.title: Function not executing
prompt_templates.prompt: My Cloud Function is not executing. It times out and shows no errors. Help me debug this.

prompt_templates.title: Auth token errors
prompt_templates.prompt: Firebase Auth is not working in the emulator. Tokens are being rejected. Debug my auth setup.

output_examples.input: Firebase emulators are not starting. I see port conflict errors.
output: Let me help you debug the Firebase emulator port conflict. Here is a systematic approach:

3. Export any existing emulator data before restarting
Would you like me to walk through each step in detail?

output_examples.input: Getting PERMISSION_DENIED errors when trying to write to Firestore.
output: I can help you debug the Firestore rules violation. Here is the process:
1. Open the Emulator UI at http://127.0.0.1:4000
3. Select the operation type and document path
4. Set the auth context with your user ID
5. Run the simulation and review the evaluation trace

best_practices: Always export emulator data before restarting to preserve test data
Use the Rules Playground in Emulator UI to test rules before deployment
Document debugging steps and solutions for future reference
anti_patterns: Using kill -9 on emulators without exporting data first
Skipping the Rules Playground and guessing at rule issues
Testing in production instead of using emulators for debugging

faq.question: Does this skill work with the Firebase Emulator Suite?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill is designed specifically for troubleshooting the Firebase Emulator Suite including Firestore, Functions, Auth, and Hosting emulators.

faq.question: Can this skill fix my security rules automatically?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides diagnostic guidance and helps you identify issues. You must manually edit and test your rules using the Rules Playground.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my project files?
faq.answer: No. This skill only provides instructions and guidance. It does not execute commands or modify any files in your project.

faq.question: What debugging tools does this skill use?
faq.answer: The skill guides you through using Firebase Emulator UI, Rules Playground, CLI commands like firebase emulators:start, and lsof for port analysis.

faq.question: Can I use this skill for production Firebase issues?
faq.answer: This skill is designed for emulator and local development issues. For production issues, use direct Firebase console and logging tools.

faq.question: How does this skill differ from firebase-development:validate?
faq.answer: Debug focuses on fixing specific errors and issues you encounter. Validate focuses on reviewing code structure and configuration without specific errors.
